description:
The AEGEAN app guarantees a seamless and carefree travel experience!
 
With all services such as: book a flight, add extras to your trip, manage your account, check-in, get your mobile boarding pass and receive real-time flight updates at your fingertips, travelling couldn't be easier.
 
BOOK A FLIGHT
Search and select flights for domestic and international routes. Find the lowest prices for your trip through the Low Fare Calendar or purchase AEGEAN pass to have multiple flights at a fixed price whenever you want.
 
VIEW AND MODIFY YOUR BOOKING
Review and enhance your flight with many options in a few steps. Last minute changes have never been easier, you can modify your trip any time according to your ticket conditions. And if you’re looking to enhance your travel experience book a transfer to or from the airport, rent a car, book a ferry or add flight related extras to your booking seamlessly (additional baggage, seat selection, fast track, Wi-Fi and much more).
 
MANAGE YOUR MILES+BONUS ACCOUNT
Discover the benefits of being a Miles+Bonus member! Receive notifications about your tier, available options to earn and spend miles with partners and use your personalized digital card right from the AEGEAN app.
 
LANGUAGES
Greek, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Russian, Romanian
 
Aegean Official Accounts
 
X: https://x.com/aegeanairlines
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aegeanairlines
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/aegeanairlines
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/aegeanairlinesvideo
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/aegean-airlines

Join the millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you’re running an errand across town or exploring a city far from home, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable, whether you're requesting a taxi for a trip or arranging a train journey.

Pick from a wide range of travel options that the Uber app has to offer including:
UberX: Affordable, everyday rides
Lux: Luxury cars with top-rated drivers for premium travel experiences
Electric: Sustainable rides in electric vehicles for eco-friendly trips
UberXL: Rides for groups up to 6, perfect for family trips
Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom to enhance your travel
Uber Pet: Ride with your pet
Reserve: Choose your exact pickup time up to 90 days in advance for planned trips
Exec: High-end cars with top-rated drivers, ideal for business travel
2-wheels: You can also bike or ride a scooter with the Uber app. Find a scooter to start riding today for quick trips
Assist: Special assistance from trained drivers for accessible travel
Access: Wheelchair accessible vehicles ensuring inclusivity in travel
Black Cab: travel with the iconic London taxi

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival, whether it's a taxi ride or train. 

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable in their travel and on trips.

AFFORDABLE PRICING
We’re doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.
Split Fare: Don’t worry about doing the math later—split the cost evenly while you’re still on the ride.

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from £0 Delivery Fee and up to 5% off eligible delivery and pickup orders, 5-10% off eligible rides, and £5 credit if our Latest Arrival Estimate on your order is off. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence. Extra wait time included to meet your ride. Cancel at no charge up to 60 minutes in advance.

TRAVEL
Get train, coach, and flight ticketing right on the Uber app. Get 10% back in Uber Credits and collect Avios when you book train, coach, and Eurostar trips. No booking fee. Make any flight flexible and refundable and avoid flight travel stress with flight disruption protection.

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. With a growing fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles, you can choose eco-friendly rides to reduce your carbon footprint.

RENT CARS
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. Get great prices & selection from the best rental companies.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favourite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience, and pet supplies, and get them all delivered.
Uber Boat: Get fast, reliable river boat services in London. For commuters and visitors. Routes run from 24 piers across the capital.
Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.

Uber is available in the following cities: London, Manchester, Leeds, Glasgow, and more. Check if Uber is available in your city at https://www.uber.com/cities. Stay updated on the latest news, promotions, and offers by following us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber and liking us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed.

At Freenow, we believe every journey should be seamless and trustworthy. That's why we're focusing more than ever on getting you reliable black cabs, taxis and more, whenever and wherever you need them. Connect to opportunities, loved ones and new experiences with peace of mind. 

Wherever life takes you, Freenow is your steadfast partner across 9 European countries. 

WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH FREENOW:
Get a taxi you can trust: your journey starts with a tap, connecting you to professional, dependable drivers in well-maintained vehicles. 
Flexible travel options: explore city life with black cabs, eScooters, eBikes, eMopeds, Carsharing or private hire vehicles (Ride). 
Car Rental: need a car for longer? Rent one through the app.

EFFORTLESS PAYMENTS:
Forget the hassle of cash. Pay securely in seconds using your preferred method: card, Google Pay, Apple Pay or PayPal. Plus, keep an eye out for discounts and vouchers!

SMOOTH AIRPORT TRANSFERS:
Whether it’s an early flight or a late arrival, count on Freenow for reliable 24/7 airport transfers. We cover major local airports, including London (Heathrow, City, Gatwick, Stansted), as well as European airports like Dublin, Frankfurt, Madrid-Barajas, Barcelona El-Prat, Munich, Rome Fiumicino, Athens, Warsaw, Manchester, Düsseldorf, Vienna Schwechat, Milan Malpensa, Berlin and Malaga. 

JOURNEYS MADE EASY:
Plan ahead: prebook your taxi up to 90 days in advance.
Seamless pickups: use our in-app chat to connect with your driver.
Stay connected: share your trip location with friends and family for peace of mind.
Personalise your experience: rate drivers and save your favourite addresses for even faster bookings.

TRAVEL FOR WORK? FREENOW FOR BUSINESS:
Simplify your business trips and expense reporting. Your employer might even offer a monthly Mobility Benefits Card for your travel. Talk to your company about us.

SPREAD THE FREENOW FEELING:
Invite your friends and they’ll get a voucher for their first ride. Once they’ve completed it, a voucher will land in your account too. Check the app for details.

Download Freenow today and get travel you can trust.

Freenow is now part of Lyft, a leader in transport. This exciting collaboration combines Freenow's trusted presence in Europe with Lyft's commitment to delivering reliable, safe and people-focused journeys. With this partnership, we're building a global network to provide you with seamless travel options and exceptional service, whether you're at home or abroad.

Freenow is  the London licensed PHV operator.

Download the highest-rated travel app and join thousands of people finding hotel, motel and holiday home travel deals. Find a stay for your holiday, weekend getaway or business trip, anywhere in the world!

Search for hotels, motels & holiday homes

• 27 million hotels, holiday rentals, homes, apartments and other unique places to stay
• Search by city, attraction, landmark or hotel name with just one tap
• Filter by price, review score, amenities and other things important to you
• Find your last-minute stay or book far in advance

Find a great travel deal

• Daily deals for every budget
• Free cancellation on most rooms
• Browse over 135 million verified guest reviews

Manage your booking on the go

• Get paperless confirmation
• Make changes whenever, wherever
• 24/7 customer service in more than 40 languages
• Contact your host, view check-in times and write reviews
• No booking or credit card fees

Make getting around easier with Bolt! Whether you need a ride across town, an airport transfer, or a scooter to zip through traffic, our app makes it easy to move around confidently and conveniently.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT?
- Request a ride in seconds: enjoy safe, affordable rides with top-rated drivers.
- Transparent pricing: see your fare upfront so there are no surprises.
- Multiple payment options: pay securely using a credit/debit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or cash.

EASY ORDERING:
- Open the app and set your destination.
- Choose from various ride types to suit your needs (Comfort, Premium, Electric, XL, and more).
- Track your driver in real time.
- Arrive in comfort and rate your experience.

SAFETY FIRST:
Some of Bolt’s safety features require the app to run in the background.

- Emergency assist button: discreetly alert our Safety Team in case of emergencies.
- Audio trip recording: record audio during rides for added peace of mind.
- Private phone details: your contact information stays confidential when you call a driver.

PLAN AHEAD:
Need an airport transfer or an early morning ride? You can schedule your trip in advance from 30 minutes to 90 days before your expected pickup time.

*JOIN BOLT PLUS TO UNLOCK PREMIUM FEATURES!
Get the best of Bolt with Bolt Plus. Enjoy exclusive perks that save you time and money, making every ride smoother and more convenient.

*BOLT DRIVE:
We're committed to our carbon net zero goal by 2040. That's why we're increasing the lineup of electric and hybrid cars in Bolt Drive, our car-sharing service. You can also rent Bolt scooters and e-bikes via the app.

*DELIVER PACKAGES
Use the 'Send' ride type to arrange fast and convenient parcel delivery in your city.

Bolt is available in 50 countries and 600+ cities worldwide (see the full list at https://bolt.eu/en/cities/). We rebranded from Taxify to Bolt in 2019.

Bolt is the perfect taxi alternative for fast, reliable, and affordable rides. The app provides a seamless ride-ordering experience whether you’re commuting, travelling, or running errands. So, the next time you need a ride, choose Bolt!

*Bolt options differ by location. Check the app for availability in your city.

Earn money driving with the Bolt Driver app. Sign up: https://bolt.eu/driver/

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at https://bolt.eu

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts, and offers!

Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/Bolt/
Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/bolt
X — https://x.com/Boltapp

With this App at your fingertips, Europe is at your feet.

We’re Ryanair, so of course you’ll find the lowest fares in Europe on our app. But you’ll also get handy extras like being able to check in while you’re on the move, a mobile boarding pass delivered straight to your phone and a choice of in-flight extras in one quick click.

So why are you still reading? Download it now and get flying!

Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy. Find the best prices on flights, hotels & rental cars – all in one place.

No matter where you are – search for cheap airline tickets, low-cost flights, and the best air fare deals to destinations worldwide. Easily find and book flights, Hotels and car hire with major airlines and providers  like Ryanair, easyJet, British Airways all in one place.  Save time and money by comparing fares across multiple airlines and travel booking platforms to get the best price. There are no booking fees or hidden charges—just the lowest prices on domestic and international flights.

But Skyscanner is more than just flights. Find budget-friendly hotels, luxury resorts, airport hotels, and holiday rentals with our hotel search, ensuring you have the perfect place to stay wherever you go. Need transportation? Compare and book affordable car hire from top providers, with options to filter by vehicle type, fuel policy, and more.
Here’s how to use our app:

Find inspiration
Can’t decide where to go? Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap ‘Everywhere’ in our search bar to find low-cost flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next holiday.

Filter your search
Know what you’re looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times. Looking for last-minute travel deals? Use filters to find flexible options and spontaneous getaways at the lowest prices.

The best time to fly
You’ve chosen where it will be, now to find the best dates to book your holiday. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we’ll let you know when the flight price changes so you’re always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right price
Thought we were just about discounted flights? Nope, we’ve got your stay covered too. Compare and book budget hotels, luxury resorts, holiday apartment rentals , motels and hostels all over the world. Or find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute hotel deal for your next holiday. 

Hire a car
Choose where and when to pick up your car hire, and we’ll show you affordable options from top car hire agencies, including Hertz, Avis, Enterprise and Europcar . You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you’re not paying too much on fuel – we’ve got your back. 

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel and airlines, including online travel agencies (OTA), in one place - easyJet, Ryanair, British Airways, Lufthansa, Wizz Air, Expedia, Booking.com, lastminute.com and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travellers. 

No added fees ever
Did we mention we don’t charge any booking fees? Never. None at all. Book directly with airlines, hotels, and travel agency services with total transparency.

Save your flights
Want to look but not ready to book a flight? No problem. We have a ‘saved’ feature where you can ‘heart’ flights or hotels you like. Then it’ll show up on your trips, so you can pick up where you left off and book your holiday. 

Why Skyscanner?
• The Telegraph; “The only 20 travel apps you’ll ever need”
• The New York Times; “Apps for Travelers Dreaming of Their Next Trip”
• Elite Daily; “7 holiday travel apps that’ll let you jingle around the world’
• Pocket-lint; “4 apps to get you ready for summer”
	
Let’s get social
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skyscanner 
• Instagram: @skyscanner 
• X: @skyscanner
• TikTok: @skyscanner
• LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/skyscanner/ 
• Website: www.skyscanner.net

Download the GetYourGuide app to discover and book unforgettable travel experiences anywhere in the world

Whether you're planning a vacation or looking for last-minute things to do in any destination, we make booking tours, day trips, and activities easier than ever. Choose from culture, food, adventure, nature, and more experiences.

Maximize your trip with exclusive access to the world's top attractions and museums, find the highlights and hidden gems, and keep up with last-minute travel deals using the app — we make travel planning easy, and making memories easier.

Find over 75,000 experiences

Booking tickets for unmissable sights has never been easier — experience the Colosseum, Eiffel Tower, London Eye, TV Tower, Sagrada Familia, and more.

Discover expert-guided tours — explore unforgettable travel highlights in Paris, Dubai, London, Florence, New York City, Berlin, Vienna, New Orleans, Cancun, Tuscany, Lisbon, and more. Our app will be your city guide for destinations around the world, and our local experts help you get fully immersed.

Travel with flexibility

Reserve now, pay later — save your place for popular experiences early and make your payment at a later date.
Instant confirmation — whether you're booking tours in advance or need last-minute tickets, receive your tickets and booking confirmation instantly.
Offline tickets — Conveniently access your booking information offline. Download, store, and present your tickets on your mobile device

Book with confidence

24/7 customer service — Easily find help when you have questions. We offer customer service by email, phone, and in the app across multiple languages.
Flexible cancellation — Don’t stress if your plans change. We offer free cancellation up to 24 hours before your activity for most bookings.

With tours and activities for any interest, you can plan your trips your way. Dive into nature and explore fjords in Norway, try local cuisine across Europe, or uncover fascinating history in the United States.

Whether you're living the magic of the wizarding world on a Harry Potter experience, savoring delicious culinary delights on a food tour of Barcelona, booking top rated tours to see the Vatican, or following a city guide through Berlin, we guarantee you'll find something unforgettable to do — make the most of your travel and leisure time.

Uncover the top tourist activities in the world's bucket-list destinations:
Book museum tours and tickets in Rome, food trips through Naples, trekking in Iceland, river cruises around Prague, outdoor adventures in Bali, sightseeing in Budapest, and more.

Use the app as a travel planner or for travel guidance, then book travel experiences for the world's must-see highlights with excursions and last-minute tickets.

Tell us how we’re doing
Leave us a review if you’re enjoying your GetYourGuide app experience or head over to our help page for further assistance: www.getyourguide.com/contact

AIRBNB MORE THAN AN AIRBNB
The world is endlessly interesting and with Airbnb, you can explore it in more ways than ever. Find remarkable homes, unforgettable experiences and incredible services all in one app. Get inspired, book and go.

BOOK A HOME AND GO WHERE HOTELS CAN’T
Explore 8+ million holiday rentals in 240+ countries and regions to find the perfect stay for every kind of trip, whether you’re travelling alone or with a group. Use over 80 filtering options to find the amenities you want, like a pool, a kitchen or accessibility features like step-free entry. View all the details of a place at a glance on the listing page and check out the ratings and reviews to see what other guests who’ve stayed there think about it too.

DON’T JUST SEE A PLACE, EXPERIENCE IT
Find thousands of experiences around the world, hosted by locals who know their city best – all vetted for quality based on a host’s expertise, reputation and authenticity. Uncover unique perspectives on landmarks and museums. Get a taste of local cuisine through cooking classes and food tours. Enjoy the great outdoors, an art workshop, a live performance and much more. Plus, check out Airbnb Originals – extraordinary experiences hosted by the world’s most interesting people, designed exclusively for Airbnb.

MAKE YOUR STAY EVEN MORE SPECIAL WITH INCREDIBLE SERVICES
Make the most of your stay by booking incredible services right at your Airbnb, like private chefs, photography, catering, prepared meals, hairstyling, nail treatments, make-up, massages, personal training and spa treatments – each offered by experienced service hosts who have been vetted for quality. You can book thousands of professional services at nearly every price, all in one app, all over the world. Best of all, you don’t need to stay at an Airbnb or even be on a trip to get these services. Schedule a blow-dry, training session and more right at home.

GET A TRAVEL APP THAT TRAVELS WITH YOU
After you book a home, you’ll get personalised recommendations on the home page suggesting services and experiences for your trip, tailored to where you’re staying and who you’re travelling with. And the redesigned Profile gives you a snapshot of all the places you’ve been to on Airbnb and the people you’ve met along the way.

FIND ALL YOUR TRIP INFO IN ONE PLACE
Quickly find or share the details of your reservation – making it easier for everyone to get there, get inside and get connected to wifi with just a tap. Our in-app messaging means every guest on the trip can easily communicate with hosts to say hi, ask questions and receive up-to-the-minute booking updates. You can also share photos, videos and even customise an Airbnb Service, all in the same chat. And with a day-by-day view of everything you’ve booked in the updated Trips tab, it’s simple to keep track of your plans and get key details like check-in times, special instructions and entry codes all in one place, even when you’re offline.

WANT TO HOST? AIRBNB MAKES IT EASY.
Whether you want to host a home, experience or service, you can reach millions of people travelling and grow your business on Airbnb. List your home in a few simple steps. Or, you can apply to host an experience or service and once approved, you’re ready to welcome the world.

YOU’VE COME THIS FAR – NOW GO FURTHER
Stop reading and fire up the app to book yourself a one-of-a-kind trip on Airbnb.

You have places to be and people to see. Get there easily and on time with an emissions-free Lime e-bike or e-scooter! 

START YOUR RIDE IN 3 STEPS
Step 1
Download the app, create an account and accept our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement
Privacy Notice 
https://www.li.me/legal/privacy-policy/ 

Step 2 
Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)

Step 3
Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or by tapping a button on the app.
RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

- Ride in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
- Wear a helmet when you ride
- Park clear of walkways, driveways and access ramps
- Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

#RIDEGREEN
Lime is on a mission to build a future where transportation is shared, affordable and carbon-free.


You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement.

Got somewhere to be? Take a Dott!
Simply unlock an e-bike or e-scooter in the Dott app, ride to your destination, and get on with your day – easy as that. 
To get started:
1. Download the Dott app
2. Check the in-app map to find a nearby e-scooter or e-bike
3. Scan the vehicle’s QR code to unlock it, and you’re off!
Pro tip: Grab a Dott pass to save on your ride. Or simply pay as you go with your secure payment method of choice.


Why choose Dott?
Dott is the simplest way to move around your city, safely and efficiently. Ditch the crowded commute and enjoy traveling in the open air. Avoid traffic jams and arrive at your destination on time – for a fraction of the cost of a taxi or car share.
Our e-scooters and e-bikes are available 24/7, making moving around your city a breeze! They’re brought in for regular maintenance and boast all the latest safety features. Plus, thanks to the smooth electric acceleration, riding our vehicles is a piece of cake.

Ride a Dott whenever you're:
* Meeting a friend for dinner
* Commuting to work
* Heading to class
* Going on a date
* Exploring your city on your day off, or sightseeing in other countries


Get around without breaking the bank
Simply pay for your rides as you go, at a price similar to public transport. Or, explore Dott passes to ride more for less: grab a pass for 24 hours, a week, or even a month to save on every ride. If you fancy a ride for free, just refer a friend and you’ll both get a free ride each! Want in on even more discounts? Turn on notifications to hear about our limited-time deals.

Where you’ll find us
Dott is currently available in 40 cities across Israel and Europe – with more on the way! Want to see Dott in your city? Drop us a line at support@ridedott.com.

Information about routes and stops for urban transport (buses) in Athens, from the Athens Urban Transport Organization (OASA).
NEW VERSION (1.2.1) with the following features and capabilities:
* 2 language support (Greek & English).
* Redesign of the entire UI for the best user experience.
* View nearby stops on a map and list, depending on the user's geographic location (gps signal). As the user's location shifts, it automatically re-searches for nearby stops.
* Directions to get to a stop by selecting a map application (Google/Apple Maps & Waze) to start navigation.
* Access to the News with the possibility of searching and automatically informing the user with a notification (push notification) in case there is an important event / article (automated categorization / priority based on keywords).
* List of main lines with the ability to view the route the bus crosses on a map.
* Timetable / Daily schedule for each line
* Real time update with buses running the selected route / selected line on the map (automatic update).
* View stop arrival information in real time.
* View vehicle arrival times for each stop.
* View a list of route stops with colors for the start / end stop
* Best route
* Save favorite lines and stops, sync to iCloud
* See your favorite stop arrivals from your apple watch

Please note that the app requires internet access (via wifi or mobile data) to work and works best with location service enabled.
For bug / error reporting, please don't forget to mention your unique Installation ID, that you can find in Settings by pressing the button "Copy Technical Details"

Hop is transforming short-distance transport habits with its shared, practical, and eco-friendly scooters! Offering a nature-friendly solution to reduce vehicle dependency and address urban mobility issues, hop provides 24/7 service for people-centric cities.

Enjoy the city by riding high-performance, eco-friendly and shared electric scooters through the hop app – just download it and hit the road!

Ride with Hop to #enjoythecity

* Cruise past traffic, save time for yourself.
* Reduce your carbon footprint.
* Boost your mode, ride free.

To start your ride:

* Download the hop app.
* Create an account.
* Find the closest hop on the map.
* Scan the QR code.
* Kick the scooter with one foot. Once you’ve gained some speed, you can push on the throttle to accelerate and start enjoying your city.
* If you want to slow down, gently use the brake.

Let's finish the ride

* After your ride has finished, park the scooter in designated parking spots without blocking pedestrians and access routes. 
* Lower the kickstand to avoid the scooter from falling over and lock it.
* Take a photo of the parked hop. 

Safety first

For your and city residents’ safety, you must follow these rules!

- One person per scooter.
- You should wear a helmet.
- Highly recommended to wear reflective gear at night.
- Do not ride while intoxicated 
- Do not ride on pavements
- You should ride slower in the downhills. 

Now, find the nearest hop from the map. Ride wherever without traffic and stress.

If you want to see hop in your city, you can contact support@hop.bike

seamore is your essential Travel Companion. 

Being always by your side it will helpyou exploring, discovering and as well as enjoying every moment of your travels! Decide where to travel to, make your reservations quickly and easily with any of the Attica Group ferries brands - Superfast Ferries, Blue Star Ferries, Hellenic Seaways, Anek Lines. Have everything you need on board and after your trip in one mobile app.

seamore: The essential Travel Companion

Your journey starts here!
Easy and lightning-fast ferry ticket booking

You can quickly book ferry tickets with all the Attica Group ferries brands - Superfast Ferries, Blue Star Ferries, Hellenic Seaways, Anek Lines - with all your data automatically filled! In your personal profile you can save your travel details, those of co-passengers, of your vehicle and of your pet. This way your bookings are completed faster than ever before. Receive the tickets on your mobile device and you are ready for your trip! And if you have a Seasmiles card, you can see how many seasmiles you have and
for the first time, redeem them anytime you want, to get free or discounted tickets.

Real-time updates
You have all the details of your next trips at your fingertips, and you receive reminders and updates for every step of the journey. Enjoy the convenience of web check-in and make your trip even more stress-free!

Detailed information on everything you need
In the Frequently Asked Questions section you will find detailed instructions and answers to any question you might have. We've made sure there are instructions for every step, so you won't run into any difficulties. If you need us, we are always available and you can contact us by phone or email.

Speed and convenience
Log in quickly with biometrics (fingerprint or Face ID) or Fast PIN for quick and easy access.

Get ready for your next adventure with the essential Travel Companion! Download seamore now and start your journey!

If you’d like to contact us with questions or ideas on how we can improve, send us an email at cs@attica-group.com and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

Do you dream of travelling? With the eSky app, you can organise your entire trip in one place! Choose cheap flight tickets from over 950 airlines, book accommodation and Flight+Hotel packages with the Lowest Price Guarantee. From a spontaneous city break to your dream holiday – with us, travelling is simple, fast, and cheap.

Cheap Flights 
Find cheap flights with the eSky app! We compare offers from Wizz Air, Ryanair, easyJet, LOT, Lufthansa, and others to ensure you get the most favourable prices. The intuitive flight search engine allows you to quickly find ideal connections, easier than through a travel agency!

Download the eSky app and start saving on travel today. Use our proven travel tricks, to find the best cheap flights:
- Price Alerts – they will help you track price changes and search for the best deals for your dream trip, whether it's a holiday or a city break. 
- Deal Notifications – Dubai, Rome, or maybe something completely new? You will never miss hot offers again, thanks to promotion notifications.
Don't waste time on separate searching for Ryanair or Wizz Air flights, or through a travel agency – you can do it in a few clicks in the eSky app.

Flight+Hotel Packages
This is the ideal solution for a city break or longer holidays! In the eSky app, you can book a flight and hotel simultaneously, saving time and money. Flight+Hotel packages are often cheaper than separate reservations, and thanks to the Lowest Price Guarantee, you are sure to get the best offer.

Hotels and Accommodation 
Find the ideal accommodation for your holiday or city break. Our database contains over 1.5 million properties worldwide, from hotels to apartments. Book separately or use the Flight+Hotel package to save and get the Lowest Price Guarantee!

User Zone is the center for managing your travels. You also have 24/7 expert support (available for Flight+Hotel packages) – we help in every situation, at any time, wherever you are. Thanks to the eSky app, your holidays and city breaks will always be perfectly organized!

Why choose eSky?
- Cheap flights and the best prices! Access to unpublished deals from over 950 airlines at 3000 airports.
- All airlines: the full offer of carriers (Ryanair, Wizz Air, LOT, Lufthansa, and others).
- Flexible packages: Flight+Hotel booking (for a city break or holiday) and planning simpler than ever!
- Comfort and certainty: consultant care and instant booking confirmation.
- Intuitiveness: you search for flights, holidays, and city breaks in a few clicks.
- Real-time updates: always up-to-date prices and the freshest promotions.   

Download the eSky mobile app and join the world of smart travellers! Cheap flights, holidays, and city breaks are now within app's reach!

FAQ 
How can I find cheap flights? 
Use the “Daily Deals” section and our inspirations in the eSky app. This is the fastest way to find cheap flights, holidays, and city break trips.

When is the best time to buy cheap flight tickets? 
Book cheap flights during the week (preferably in the morning). Use the flexible calendar function and don't forget to enable notifications in the eSky app to catch the best price and not miss any deal! 

Where to fly cheaply? 
Check the daily deals that we prepare for you in the eSky app! You will find cheap flights to popular and exotic destinations, tailored to your price preferences. 

Can I make changes to my booking, e.g., refund a ticket?  
In the User Zone, you can check the booking status and manage selected elements. To change flight tickets, contact the eSky Customer Service Centre.

The eSky app is available in over 20 languages and works worldwide. Travel wisely, save money, and discover the world with eSky!

Travel Booking Made Easy: Compare and Book Train, Bus, Flight and Ferry tickets with Omio! 

Omio makes planning your next trip simple. Compare and book train, ferry, flight, and bus tickets — all in one place!

Not only are we launching South East Asia, but we’re also venturing into South America, offering buses and flights in Brazil. Live Updates: Receive real-time updates on your trip, including platform changes, delays, and gate information.
Mobile Tickets: Save time by adding your train, bus, plane and ferry tickets directly to the app. Skip the lines and get your ticket ready whenever you need it.
Support at the Palm of Your Hand: Omio provides 24/7 international customer service, ensuring you’re always covered, no matter where you are.

Stay connected wherever you travel. With an Airalo eSIM (digital SIM), you can connect like a local in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Install an eSIM and get online in minutes. No roaming fees — just easy, affordable, global connectivity.

What is an eSIM?
An eSIM is an embedded SIM card. It's built into your phone's hardware and functions like a physical SIM. But it works 100% digitally.

Instead of dealing with a physical SIM card, you can purchase an eSIM, install it on your device, and instantly connect to a mobile network at your destination.

What is an Airalo eSIM plan?
An Airalo eSIM plan gives you access to mobile data, call, and text services. You can choose a prepaid local, regional, or global eSIM plan to get online in 200+ countries and regions worldwide. Simply download an eSIM, install it on your device, and connect to a mobile network when you arrive at your destination!

How does it work?
1. Install the Airalo app.
2. Purchase an eSIM plan for your travel destination.
3. Install the eSIM.
4. Turn on your eSIM and connect to the internet upon arrival.

Available for 200+ countries and regions, including: 
- United States
- United Kingdom
- Turkey
- Italy
- France
- Spain
- Japan
- Germany
- Canada
- Thailand
- Portugal
- Morocco
- Colombia
- India
- South Africa

Why Airalo?
- Stay connected in 200+ countries and regions.
- Install and activate an eSIM in minutes.
- Affordable eSIM plans with no hidden fees.
- Choose from local, regional, and global eSIMs.
- Call, text, and access data with a Discover+ global eSIM.

Why travelers love eSIMs:
- Easy, affordable, instant connectivity.
- 100% digital. No need to fuss with physical SIM cards or Wi-Fi devices.
- No hidden fees or surprise roaming charges.
- Store multiple eSIMs on a single device.
- Add and switch eSIM plans on the go.


eSIM FAQ
What does an Airalo eSIM plan come with?
- An Airalo package comes with data (e.g., 1GB, 3GB, 5GB, etc.) valid for a specified time period (e.g., 7 days, 15 days, 30 days, etc.). If you run out of data or your validity period expires, you can top up your eSIM or download a new one right from the Airalo app.

How much does it cost?
- eSIMs from Airalo start from US$4.50 for 1GB of data.

Does an eSIM come with a number?
- Some eSIMs, including our Global Discover+ eSIM, come with a phone number so you can call, text, and access data. Check your eSIM's description for details. 

What devices are ready?
- You can find a regularly updated list of eSIM-compatible devices at this link:
https://www.airalo.com/help/about-airalo/what-devices-support-esim 

Who is Airalo best for?
- Anyone who travels, whether it's for business or vacation.
- Digital nomads who need to stay connected to work while abroad.
- Crew members (e.g., seafarers, flight attendants, etc.) who need to stay connected while they travel.
- Anyone who wants an easy and affordable data alternative to their home network.

Can I use my SIM card at the same time?
Yes! Most devices allow you to use multiple SIMs and/or eSIMs simultaneously. You can keep your primary line active to receive text messages, calls, and 2FA authentication (but remember, they'll be subject to roaming fees).


Happy travels!

–

Roamy — turn saved posts into real trips

Thousands of travel videos saved across your Instagram and TikTok… and zero time to turn them into a plan? You can’t search those folders, you keep rewatching clips to find the exact spot, pinning places on Google Maps takes forever, and spreadsheets don’t tell you how far anything is. We get it. Trip planning from scratch is painful—and your saved folder is begging to be used.

Roamy fixes the mess. With one tap, pull every location mentioned in a video, drop them onto a map, and see your entire collection of spots—clearly, visually, and all in one place. When you’re ready to go, just tell Roamy how many days you have. We’ll build a sensible, day-by-day itinerary that connects the dots for you. Trip planning, minus the stress.

Who Roamy is for
- You’ve got dozens of folders and thousands of saved travel posts across Instagram and TikTok.
- You love picking the spots—but hate the logistics.
- You want everything in one place: your saved locations, a clean map, and a plan that actually fits your days.

How it works

- 1-tap save from socials: Import places from TikTok/Instagram with a single click. Roamy detects locations mentioned in the video and adds them for you.
- See everything on a map: No more scattered folders or notes. Your saved spots appear on a clean map so you can visualize your trip at a glance.
- Your master collection: Keep every restaurant, landmark, café, and hidden gem in one organized list—with links back to the original posts and reviews.
- Get your perfect itinerary: Tell Roamy your trip length and we’ll arrange your days into a logical route so you’re not zig-zagging across town.
- Duplicate & share trips: Copy community guides or friends’ itineraries and customize them to your style—or share your own with a link.
- Review & go: Tap any spot for details, tips, and prep notes so you know exactly why it’s on your list.

Why people love it
- Turns chaos into clarity: Your social saves become a visual, actionable plan.
- Saves hours: Stop rewatching videos and manually pinning.
- Keeps your taste: It’s your collection—Roamy just organizes it and makes it trip-ready.
- Stress-free planning: From “I saved it” to “I’m going” in a few taps

Travy is your all-in-one trip companion that builds personalized itineraries with everything you need to explore a new city or country. Whether you are staying for three weeks or passing through for just a few hours, Travy creates detailed plans that match your time, taste, and budget.

Travy helps you discover what to do, where to go, and how to get there without spending hours researching or switching between apps. You can book everything in one place and follow a smart, time-based itinerary designed just for you.


→ FEATURES

1) Instant Itinerary Builder: Enter your destination, dates, and interests. Travy instantly builds a personalized trip plan for your full stay.

2) Smart Flight Matching: Find and book flights that suit your timing and budget without needing multiple tabs or apps.

3) Hotel Suggestions: Receive hotel options tailored to your comfort preferences, location, and price range.

4) Local Restaurant Picks: Discover food spots based on your taste, budget, and dietary needs, all within walking distance.

5) Events and Experiences: Access concerts, local festivals, guided tours, and unique activities tailored to your interests and travel window.

6) Car Rentals: Book vehicles that match your travel style with clear pricing and easy pickup across thousands of cities.

7) Shopping Recommendations: Get curated shopping centers and markets that reflect your style and budget, whether luxury or local.

8) Mini-Itineraries for Layovers: Have a short stay? Travy builds full plans for single-day visits or even a 22-hour layover.



→ WHY CHOOSE TRAVY?

1) Built for Every Type of Traveler: Travy adapts to solo travelers, couples, families, and groups to make each trip personal and efficient.

2) Trusted by Leading Travel Brands: Travy is trusted by platforms including Eventbrite, Expedia, Airbnb, Kayak, Booking.com, and TripAdvisor.

3) Replaces Tabs and Spreadsheets: Say goodbye to chaotic planning. Travy brings flights, hotels, food, and experiences into one streamlined timeline.

4) Human-Centered Travel Planning: Travy provides practical, personalized suggestions that feel natural and relevant to you.

5) Book Everything in One Place: No more switching apps. Book flights, hotels, restaurants, and cars directly from Travy.

6) Works for Short Trips Too: Planning a quick stop? Travy builds full experiences even for short stays or unexpected travel gaps.


Thousands of travelers already trust Travy to plan smarter and enjoy more. Wherever you are headed next, let Travy be your guide.
Download Travy and make your next trip simple, personal, and unforgettable.

The OSETH Mobile app offers you a complete urban transportation experience in the city of Thessaloniki (Greece).

Get detailed information about bus stops, routes, schedules, and estimated arrival times (ETAs) through telematics. Track your bus in real time on the map and plan your journey with ease.

You can also register to purchase and use QR tickets, ensuring smooth and hassle-free transportation with Thessaloniki’s city buses.

MOOW is an electric scooter sharing service, introducing a new transport solution “accessible to everyone” in European cities.


We are on a mission to make urban mobility accessible, aesthetic and comfortable through the sharing of electric vehicles.

HOW TO  START MOOW
1. Download the MOOW app, sing up,add your preferred payment method
2. Find a MOOW scooter near you on the map
3. Scan the QR code on the scooter to unlock it or enter the plate number

Ride responsible and learn MOOW safety tutorial before the first MOOW journey. 

HOW TO FINISH YOUR RIDE 
1.  End your ride in any parking area marked with a "P" on the map
2. Open the MOOW app and tap 'End Ride'
3. Now the scooter is available for the next MOOW


WOOW MOOW FEATURES
- Special price and offers for students, locals, tourists and other customers
- Reserve scooters for free 
- Ride with friends. Rent multiple scooters from one account 
- MOOW more pay less with our cool MOOW pass subscription.


Contact our MOOW Support team in the in-app chat our heroes are always ready to help you.

MOOW ON!

Information about routes and stops for urban transport (buses) of Thessaloniki, from the Organization of Urban Transport of Thessaloniki (OASTH).
NEW VERSION with the following features and capabilities:
* Support of 2 languages (Greek & English).
* Redesign of the entire UI for the best user experience.
* View nearby stops on a map and list, depending on the user's geographic location (gps signal). As the user's moves, it automatically re-searches for nearby stops.
* Directions to get to a stop by selecting a map application (Google/Apple Maps & Waze) to start navigation.
* Access to the Press Release (News) with the possibility of searching and automatically updating the user with a notification (push notification) in case there is an important event / article (automated categorization / prioritization based on keywords).
* List of main lines with the ability to view the bus route on map.
* Route schedule for each line and case (e.g. route changes).
* Actual information about which buses are currently moving in the selected route / selected line on the map (automatic update).
* View stop arrival information in real time.
* Save favorite lines and stops (automatically sync across all your devices via iCloud).

* Support Live Activities / Standby Mode & Dynamic Island (a specific arrival is selected from the stop of your choice so that the "eye" icon appears and you are informed in real time of the bus arrival time at a glance, also with push notifications).



Developed by 3Pi Information Systems SA.


Please note that the app requires internet access (via wifi or mobile data) to work and works best with location service enabled.
